title: 107_hr1026
content: Increased Individual Retirement Accounts for All Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) increase the annual limitation on deductible contributions to individual retirement accounts (IRAs) to $5,000 and provide a cost-of-living adjustment to such amount. (2) provide for increased catch-up contributions for individuals aged 50 or older. And (3) until December 31, 2005, allow a nonrefundable credit to certain individuals for elective deferrals and IRA contributions.
